subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Richards, who signed a one-year, $2 million deal with Chicago, has played a starring role as the No. 2 center on a team set to begin the Stanley Cup finals Wednesday against the Tampa Bay Lightning.
snippet: Richards, who signed a one-year, $2 million deal with Chicago, has played a starring role as the No. 2 center on a team set to begin the Stanley Cup finals Wednesday against the Tampa Bay Lightning.
